intro: Macronema obovatum, commonly known as the broad-ovate macronema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its broad, ovate-shaped leaves. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in forest understories. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and greenhouses.
